revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RP-AC87 |revision= |asin= |series=AC2600 |est_release_date=04/21/2017 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=range extender, repeater, access point, media bridge, |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_RPAC87,ASUS_RPAC87_5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless-AC2600 Dual Band Repeater}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ Product page] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/News/IEo2BzJScDpbpl2L News] {{see also|ASUS RP-AC66|ASUS RP-AC55}} ===Reviews=== *[https://www.eteknix.com/asus-rp-ac87-wireless-ac2600-dual-band-repeater-review/ ''ASUS RP-AC87 Wireless AC2600 Dual-Band Repeater'' on '''Eteknix'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-asus-rp-ac87 ''ASUS RP-AC87 Wireless AC2600 Repeater'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===GPL Info=== 
export RP-AC87 := HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7621=y BBEXTRAS=y 
  EBTABLES=y AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC87" RPAC87=y NVRAM_64K=y 
  ODMPID=y REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y 
  NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y MTK_REP=y 
  DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y QAM256_2G=y \
    ATED122=y MTK_8021X3000=y \
    TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
    RALINK_DFS=y \
    BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI DRAM=128M \
    FIRST_IF=MT7615E SECOND_IF=MT7615E \
    CONCURRENTREPEATER=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y \
    EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7621_BAUDRATE=57600 RT2880_DRAM_128M=y 
     UBOOT_CMDLINE=y MODEL_RPAC87=y RA_NAT_HW=n FIRST_IF_IPAELNA=y 
     SECOND_IF_IPAELNA=y SMART_CARRIER_SENSE_SUPPORT=y 
     MT_DFS_SUPPORT=y"
__NOTOC__
